name: Christmas Blueberry Tea
description: No flavouring – just a beautiful warm drink reminiscent of blueberries!

ingredients.name: Cointreau or Grand Marnier® orange liqueur

preparation: Pour a 1 oz shot of each liqueur into each preheated glass.
Top 2⁄3 full with warm Christmas Tea.
tips: DIY Bar Tip: Brew Christmas Tea as guests arrive. Place in an insulated tea pot next to garnish, recipe, and liqueurs.
